rationale: The hyperscribe output accurately documents the clinician's response about taking the missed dose of escitalopram on the same day if remembered, or skipping it if remembered the next day.
The hyperscribe output does not include any mention of the clinician's suggestion of setting a phone reminder or placing the medication in a visible location.
There is no mention of the patient's concern about maintaining progress in managing her major depressive disorder due to missed doses.
The hyperscribe output does not document the patient's acknowledgment of the suggested strategies or her intention to try using a phone reminder.
The output fails to document any assessment or follow-up plan related to the patient's major depressive disorder.
